last_episode_to_air.name: The Zombie Awakes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dr. Quackbrain, a deranged psychiatrist, convinces Duckula to take part in an experiment and traps Duckula in his Dream Machine. It becomes up to Nanny and Igor to enter the dream and save the Count.

name: Count Duckula
overview: Count Duckula is a vegetarian vampire duck, coming into the world as an accident. Unlike his family and ancestors, he has no bloodlust, as when he was reincarnated, blood was omitted and replaced with ketchup.

episodes.name: No Sax Please: We're Egyptian
episodes.overview: Duckula travels to Egypt to look for an ancient saxophone that will help him to become a rock star.

episodes.name: Vampire Vacation
episodes.overview: Duckula goes on a vacation to Spain to visit his cousin.

episodes.name: One Stormy Night
episodes.overview: Von Goosewing has created a creature to kill Duckula, but in order to get it to work he must enlist the help of one of Duckula's resurrected ancestors.

episodes.name: Transylvanian Homesick Blues
episodes.overview: Duckula, Igor, and nanny go for a ride on a roller coaster run by a Mr. Fexactely. The coaster takes them on a strange trip through time.

episodes.name: Restoration Comedy
episodes.overview: To Igor's displeasure, the Count has hired Mr. Roberto to renovate the castle. He wants to make it less evil-looking.

episodes.name: Mutinous Penguins
episodes.overview: While looking for the castle, which has transported to the Antarctic, Duckula, Nanny, and Igor are trapped on an ice flow by mutinous penguins. There, they must deal not only with looking for the castle, but with the Vikings that are stuck there with them.

episodes.name: Dr. Von Goosewing's Invisible Ray
episodes.overview: Von Goosewing has built an invisible ray, which he plans to use to get rid of Duckula. Meanwhile, Duckula, Igor, and Nanny argue about magic tricks and spells.

episodes.name: Down Under Duckula
episodes.overview: Duckula decides that Nanny needs psychiatric help, so he transports the caste to Austria. Unfortunatly, the castle ends up in Australia instead. There, Duckula accidentaly gives away the castle's coo-coo clock, whick is a part of the mechanism that allows the castle to transport. He, Igor, and Nanny travel all over Australia to get it back.

episodes.name: All in a Fog
episodes.overview: Duckula decides he wants to become a famous detective, like Sherlock Holmes, so he, Nanny, and Igor travel to London.

episodes.name: Castle Duckula: Open to the Public
episodes.overview: Duckula decides to raise money by opening the castle to the public. This opportunity to enter the castle gives Von Goosewing the chance he has been looking for to finally capture Duckula. Meanwhile, Nanny gets a case of amnesia.

episodes.name: The Ghost of McCastle McDuckula
episodes.overview: While in Scotland looking for the Loch Ness Monster, Duckula meets another vampire duck and is taken to his haunted castle.

episodes.name: Igor's Busy Day
episodes.overview: A couple who's car has broken down seek shelter in the castle, and causes Igor to think fondly about the good old evil days.

episodes.name: Autoduck
episodes.overview: in another money-making attempt, the count opens the castle as a bed and breakfast. When business is slow, he decides to attract more tourists by breaking the land speed record.

episodes.name: The Vampire Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Von Goosewings's latest device reacts with Nanny's home-brewed Sasparilla and launches the castle into space. There, they are rescued by Tremendous Terrence, who later maroons them on the planet Cute.

episodes.name: Hardluck Hotel
episodes.overview: When the Transylvanian currency loses its value, Duckula decides to take a vacation out of the country. While looking for a place to stay the night, he runs into a hotel manager that is almost exactly like Basil Fawlty (from the show Fawlty Towers).

episodes.name: The Hunchbudgie of Notre Dame
episodes.overview: While in Paris, Duckula buys the Eifel Tower and becomes wrapped up in a heist to steal the Mona Lisa.

episodes.name: Dear Diary
episodes.overview: Duckula decides to have his ancestors' memoirs published.

episodes.name: Rent a Butler
episodes.overview: Duckula decides to make some money by renting out Igor and Nanny to other people as servants. He ends up regretting this when he finds himself alone in the castle.

episodes.name: Jungle Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula travels to Africa to find the treasure of an ancient hidden city.

episodes.name: Mobile Home
episodes.overview: Some wealthy American tourists visit castle Duckula and decide they want to buy it. Not knowing that it has a transport mechanism, they accept the Crow Brothers' offer to transport the castle to America in pieces.

episodes.name: A Fright at the Opera
episodes.overview: While visiting the Milan Opera House, Duckula, Nanny, and Igor run into the mysterious phantom. The phantom's servant turns out to be an old school chum of Igor. The action picks up as the Phantom kidnaps Nanny. In trying to rescue her, the opera house is destroyed and the Phantom goes to America to haunt the Grand Ole Opray.

episodes.name: Dr. Goosewing and Mr. Duck
episodes.overview: Von Goosewing's latest invention is a formula that can change people's characters. He sells it to Duckula as a carpet shampoo and it has strange effects. It makes Duckula act like a real vampire, Nanny is smart, and Igor becomes cheerful.

episodes.name: Town Hall Terrors
episodes.overview: Realizing that the castle needs major repairs, Duckula goes to the town council to get a grant to repair it. When he gets the grant, he gives the money to some tricksters who build a railroad right through the castle.

episodes.name: Sawdust Ring
episodes.overview: Duckula decides to enter the circus. Unfortunately, the former circus workers come back to sabotage the performance.

episodes.name: Duck and the Broccoli Stalk
episodes.overview: Von Goosewing plans to use a growth formula to grow a huge clove of garlic next to the castle to kill Duckula. He spills some on Duckula's broccoli by accident and it grows, carrying castle Duckula and its inhabitants to a castle in the clouds that is owned by a giant.

episodes.name: Family Reunion
episodes.overview: Duckula is hosting the Duckula family reunion. He is scared that the others will kill him for being a vegetarian instead of a blood-sucker. When his plan to fool them goes wrong, he (in disguise) makes a deal with Von Goosewing to try to get rid of his relatives.

episodes.name: Ghostly Gold
episodes.overview: Duckula finds a newspaper declaring that gold has been found in the mountains. After traveling there, and finding nothing but a ghost town, he realizes that the newspaper was several years old.

episodes.name: Ducknapped
episodes.overview: Duckula is kidnapped by two very inept kidnappers. Nanny and Igor later rescue him and spend all his ransom money without giving him a share.

episodes.name: The Lost Valley
episodes.overview: While trying to search for treasure, the castle and its inhabitants are transported into a movie.

episodes.name: Incredible Shrinking Duck
episodes.overview: Von Goosewing's latest shrinking device shrinks Castle Duckula down to the size of a toy.

episodes.name: Hi-Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula, Igor, and Nanny are on their way to a vacation. The plane they are on gets hi-jacked by a couple of French criminals. Duckula manages to stop them, but must cancel his vacation so that he can return to Transylvania and give testimony at the crooks' trial.

episodes.name: Prime-Time Duck
episodes.overview: A local TV station is making a documentary about Castle Duckula and the Count. Unfortunately, they don't think Duckula is scary enough, so they make Igor play the part of the Count.

episodes.name: Bloodsucking Fruit Bats of the Lower Amazon
episodes.overview: While traveling in South America, Duckula, Igor, and Nanny are captured by a tribe of amazon women. Things look bleak until the tribe makes Nanny their leader.

episodes.name: The Count and the Pauper (I Don't Wanna Work on Maggots Farm No More)
episodes.overview: The Count is sick of being a count, so he leaves Castle Duckula. He runs into someone who looks just like him named Sid Quack, a peasant farmer. The two decide to switch places.

episodes.name: In Arctic Circles
episodes.overview: The Count moves the castle to the North Pole to get away from a heat wave. There, he moves into a huge igloo and hires a new butler. In order to get rid of the new butler and get his job back, Igor makes a deal with Von Goosewing.

episodes.name: Transylvanian Take-Away
episodes.overview: French thieves Gaston and Pierre plan to break into Castle Duckula to steal a priceless vase. They are caught, and inform Duckula that the vase is actually part of a map that leads to the treasure of Mandarin leader How Fat. Duckula goes in search of it and ends up on the island of Moi Chow in a race against How Fat and the mutinous penguins to the treasure.

episodes.name: Who Dunnit?
episodes.overview: Duckula travels to England to hear the will of the Duke of Mallardborough. When it is revealed that the Duke was murdered, many different suspects are interrogated. The investigation begins to focus on Duckula, who is coerced into confessing. He is put on trial and, just before the verdict is announced, the Duke appears, alive, and states that his death was a hoax.

episodes.name: No Yaks Please, We're Tibetan
episodes.overview: Duckula, Igor, Nanny, and the Crow Brothers are mountain climbing in Tibet when they encounter the Abominable Snowman.

episodes.name: Beau Duckula
episodes.overview: Sick of life at the castle, Duckula runs off and joins the French Foreign Legion.

episodes.name: Mississippi Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula claims to be the world's best jazz trumpeter. His claim attracts the attention of a Mississippi steamboat captain, who hires Duckula as an act.

episodes.name: Amnesiac Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula gets amnesia after falling in a hole. He becomes a stereotypical vampire: evil. This makes Igor very happy, and not too motivated to turn Duckula back.

episodes.name: Mysteries of the Wax Museum
episodes.overview: The owner of a wax museum creates robot copies of Duckula, Nanny, and Igor. He uses them to rob a bank.

episodes.name: Return of the Curse of the Secret of the Mummy's Tomb Meets Franken Duckula's Monster ...
episodes.overview: Duckula is chased down by a large group of people, including alien cabbage, a warewolf, a mummy, Dr. Von Goosewing, and some angry villagers.

episodes.name: Lost City of Atlantis
episodes.overview: After being stranded on an small island, Duckula finds himself captured by the citizens of Atlantis.

episodes.name: Bad Luck Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula tries to prove to Nanny how stupid her superstitions about friday the 13th are. In the process, Duckula experiences a streak of incredibly bad luck.

episodes.name: Private Beak
episodes.overview: The Count becomes a private eye after reading a bunch of detective stories.

episodes.name: Astro Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula's new supercomputer accidentally launches a rocket into space.

episodes.name: Unreal Estate
episodes.overview: Duckula, sick of the old castle, transports it to California so that he can sell it and make a big profit. He has trouble finding a buyer, though, since Igor, not wanting to leave the castle, shows all the buyers the torture rooms. Meanwhile, Von Goosewing has followed them in a continued effort to kill Duckula.

episodes.name: Bombay Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula, Igor, and Nanny are lured on a decoy treasure hunt by a genie. Meanwhile, the genie's master steals the coffin from the castle so that he can woo the local princess. The princess is taken istead by Duckula, who has to decide weather to stay with her or return to Transylvania.

episodes.name: There are Werewolves at the Bottom of My Garden
episodes.overview: Tauser, the castle warewolf, has escaped. Duckula has to find him while at the same time dealing with a witch and a robot warewolf designed by Von Goosewing.

episodes.name: Duck Ahoy
episodes.overview: Duckula and co. enter a yacht race for a substantial prize.

episodes.name: The Great Ducktective
episodes.overview: Duckula is disappointed when an interview with two great detectives doesn't lead to him becoming famous. Meanwhile, Igor taunts Von Goosewing.

episodes.name: Dead Eye Duck
episodes.overview: Duckula, sick of the cold Transylvanian weather, transports the castle to Colorado. Here he, Igor, and Nanny find themselves in the wild west.

episodes.name: The Show Must Go On
episodes.overview: Duckula enlists the help of the Crow Brothers to put on a stage show.

episodes.name: A Christmas Quacker
episodes.overview: Christmas has come to Castle Duckula, but there is chaos:   Duckula hallucinates that he and superhero Tremendous Terrance save Santa from a monster. Von Goosewing has a ""present"" for the Count. And the real Santa is lost in the castle's large chimney system.

episodes.name: The Rest is History
episodes.overview: The Count goes back in time to stop the first Count Duckula from becomming a vampire.

episodes.name: O.O. Duck
episodes.overview: The Egg, an evil mastermind, needs the castle as part of his plan for world conquest. To distract Duckula, he sends him on a fake spy mission.

episodes.name: Mystery Cruise
episodes.overview: Nanny has won a trip for 3 on a luxury cruise ship. Nanny causes so many incidents that all the other people on the ship hide until she leaves the ship.

episodes.name: Around the World in a Total Daze
episodes.overview: A famous world explorer is hired by Von Goosewing to challenge Duckula to a race around the world. Though Von Goosewing cheats, Castle Duckula still finishes first. Still, Duckula is denied the grand prize.

episodes.name: Manhattan Duck
episodes.overview: The Count transports the castle to Manhattan, where Transylvanian style suddenly becomes the newest fasion fad. Seeing his chance to make a fortune, Duckula sells off most of the contents of the caslte, including Igor. Duckula and Nanny use the money to have a grand time in the city. Unfortunately they may be stuck there, since one of the things they sold was the clock that controls the transport mechanism.

episodes.name: Alps-A-Daisy
episodes.overview: Duckula travels to a winter sports competition and tries to compete in every event.

episodes.name: Prince Duckula
episodes.overview: After a TV appearance, a group of revolutionaries hire Duckula to impersonate a prince.

episodes.name: Venice a Duck Not a Duck
episodes.overview: The Egg, the Crow brothers, Maurice the Strongman, Charlie the Clown, the Mutinous Penguins, Gaston, Pierre, Cruel, and the Phantom of the Opera all combine forces to get revenge on Duckula.

episodes.name: A Mountie Always Gets His Duck
episodes.overview: When a Mountie tracks and catches a criminal in Transylvania, Duckula makes a deal with him: he will transport him back to Canada, if Duckula can be a mountie. Once a mountie, Duckula finds himself on an adventure to save the beautiful Ann Marie.

episodes.name: The Zombie Awakes
episodes.overview: Dr. Quackbrain, a deranged psychiatrist, convinces Duckula to take part in an experiment and traps Duckula in his Dream Machine. It becomes up to Nanny and Igor to enter the dream and save the Count.
